body_html:
I tried, but there is another issue. I copied cifar10 model, but it doesn't utilize all the gpus. For example, conv2D is not copied for all gpus. I also got tensorflow/core/common_runtime/simple_placer.cc:668] Ignoring device specification /device:GPU:0 for node 'AutoParallel-Replica-0/GradientDescent' because the input edge from 'global_step_1' is a reference connection and already has a device field set to /device:GPU:2

Can you give an example?
body_text:
I tried, but there is another issue. I copied cifar10 model, but it doesn't utilize all the gpus. For example, conv2D is not copied for all gpus. I also got  tensorflow/core/common_runtime/simple_placer.cc:668] Ignoring device specification /device:GPU:0 for node 'AutoParallel-Replica-0/GradientDescent' because the input edge from 'global_step_1' is a reference connection and already has a device field set to /device:GPU:2
Can you give an example?
body:
I tried, but there is another issue. I copied cifar10 model, but it doesn't utilize all the gpus. For example, conv2D is not copied for all gpus. I also got ` tensorflow/core/common_runtime/simple_placer.cc:668] Ignoring device specification /device:GPU:0 for node 'AutoParallel-Replica-0/GradientDescent' because the input edge from 'global_step_1' is a reference connection and already has a device field set to /device:GPU:2`

Can you give an example?
